title: Home
content: Welcome. This site contains practical guides and snippets for Siebel developers and administrators. Featured: Siebel Configuration, Scripting, Workflow, Integration, Open UI.

title: Siebel Configuration
content: Business Components, Business Objects, Views, Applets, Joins, Screens, Tables. Field Properties, Picklists, Calculated Fields, Search Specifications, Indexes, Access Control, Audit, Custom Fields, Sort Orders.

title: Scripting Guide
content: Browser Scripts client-side logic events PreInvokeMethod PostSetFieldValue. Server Scripts PreWrite PostWrite PreQuery data validation. Business Services service types PropertySets. Scripting Patterns validation cascading updates error handling.

title: Workflow Guide
content: Workflow Fundamentals Triggers Conditions Actions Steps Subprocess. Process Design creating processes workflow types triggers. Workflow Actions Email actions Record actions Service actions Invoke Business Service. Best Practices design patterns performance tips security.

title: Integration Guide
content: EAI Enterprise Application Integration Message Server Adapters Documents. REST API SOAP APIs HTTP methods JSON XML. File-Based Adapters CSV XML Fixed-Width EDI batch processing. Business Service Integration custom integration logic error handling retry patterns. Security performance monitoring debugging.

title: Open UI Guide
content: Open UI Architecture jQuery components Control Renderer Model Handler. Custom Control Development creating controls code examples. CSS Styling responsive design modern frameworks. Data Binding Events connecting UI to application data event handling patterns. Best Practices development mobile responsive performance testing.
